description: {"blocks":[{"key":"en0qg","text":"The endoplasmic reticulum (ER) employs a diverse proteome landscape","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ecqq","text":"to orchestrate many cellular functions, ranging from protein and lipid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eml24","text":"synthesis to calcium ion flux and inter-organelle communication. A case","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"begng","text":"in point concerns the process of neurogenesis, where a refined tubular","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bq9lt","text":"ER network is assembled via ER shaping proteins into the newly formed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ngvq","text":"neuronal projections to create highly polarized dendrites and axons.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c59mq","text":"Previous studies have suggested a role for autophagy in ER remodelling,","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"453hh","text":"as autophagy-deficient neurons in vivo display axonal ER accumulation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8n1b0","text":"within synaptic boutons, and the membrane-embedded ER-phagy receptor","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aobse","text":"FAM134B has been genetically linked with human sensory and autonomic","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7drjk","text":"neuropathy. However, our understanding of the mechanisms underlying","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dk5ve","text":"selective removal of the ER and the role of individual ER-phagy receptors is","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kt7r","text":"limited. Here we combine a genetically tractable induced neuron (iNeuron)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6unm","text":"system for monitoring ER remodelling during in vitro differentiation with","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c47pq","text":"proteomic and computational tools to create a quantitative landscape of ER","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ar56v","text":"proteome remodelling via selective autophagy. Through analysis of single","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cm5hl","text":"and combinatorial ER-phagy receptor mutants, we delineate the extent to","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pc20","text":"which each receptor contributes to both the magnitude and selectivity of","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnegk","text":"ER protein clearance. We define specific subsets of ER membrane or lumenal","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"406uf","text":"proteins as preferred clients for distinct receptors. Using spatial sensors and","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"am0t8","text":"flux reporters, we demonstrate receptor-specific autophagic capture of ER","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"726cj","text":"in axons, and directly visualize tubular ER membranes within","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dm5ua","text":"autophagosomes in neuronal projections by cryo-electron tomography. This molecular","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"acq8a","text":"inventory of ER proteome remodelling and versatile genetic toolkit provide","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5i9i","text":"a quantitative framework for understanding the contributions of individual","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32hhu","text":"ER-phagy receptors for reshaping ER during cell state transitions.\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
